CustomerChatActivity
CustomerChatActivity class manages the chat interface for customers, allowing them to connect to the Websocket server, send and receive messages, and handle user interface updates.
CustomerFragment
 
EditMedsActivity
EditMedsActivity class provides an interface for editing medication details, allowing users to update the name and stock of a specified medication.
LoginActivity
LoginActivity handles user login operations, allowing users to log in with their email and password.
MainActivity
MainActivity serves as the entry point of the application.
MedicationActivity
MedicationActivity manages interactions with the medication inventory, allowing the user to view, add, edit, and delete medications.

PetCardFragment

SignupActivity provides the functionality for user sign-up, allowing new users to create an account.

VetChatActivity manages the chat interface for vets, allowing them to connect to the Websocket server, send and receive messages, and handle user interface updates.
